ngiemboon: Mé kɔʼɔ́ máa tӱǒ, á gwe lê sêm.
en: We cut down a big tree and it fell with a “sêm” noise.
Carries the best yams to keep.

ngiemboon: Mèŋ n ge nkẅì, ɔ̀ náa lelÿɔʼ mbÿag ngie ngáa?
en: I'm single and you give me the raw yam, what should I do?

ngiemboon: Lesoŋ sɔ́ɔn ka ne ńgyáŋa, mé nyé sɛ̌, ńtsɔ́ʼ sendyɛ̀ʼɛ.
en: When my tooth hurt, we left this one to remove the other.

ngiemboon: Ɔ̀ lɔɔn ńkÿo séság, mbà  ngwɔ́ ɔ̀ gwe.
en: If you run too much, you can fall.
He has come a long way.
